Instagram Engineering: Storing hundreds of millions of simple key-value pairs in Redis

scaffolding. At Instagram, we recently had to do just that: for legacy reasons, we need to keep around a mapping of about 300 million photos back to the user ID that created them, in order to know which shard to query (see more infoâ€¦
